# vertical(layoutSize:subitems:)

**Type Method**

Creates a group of the specified size, containing an array of items arranged in a vertical line.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor class func vertical(layoutSize: NSCollectionLayoutSize, subitems: [NSCollectionLayoutItem]) -> Self
```

## Parameters

- **layoutSize**: The groupâ€™s size.
- **subitems**: The subitems to include.

## Creating a vertical group

- **vertical(layoutSize:subitem:count:)**: Creates a group of the specified size, containing an array of equally sized items arranged in a vertical line up to the number specified by count.
